\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* song \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* sung \w with|strong="H5921"\w* melody \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w laid|strong="H5375"\w* \w waste|strong="H7703"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* spoiled: \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w changed|strong="H4171"\w*: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, whereas \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* returning \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cord|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Speak|strong="H5197"\w* ye \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, saying: \w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* drop upon \w these|strong="H0428"\w*, confusion \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* take them.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* saith: \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* straitened, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H1697"\w*? \w Are|strong="H0428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* walketh \w uprightly|strong="H3477"\w*?

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w on|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* contrary, \w are|strong="H4421"\w* \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w an|strong="H6965"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: \w you|strong="H7725"\w* have \w taken|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w cloak|strong="H8008"\w* \w off|strong="H6584"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* coat: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* harmless \w you|strong="H7725"\w* have \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0802"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w delight|strong="H8588"\w*: \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w praise|strong="H5769"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w children|strong="H5768"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* depart, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* \w here|strong="H2063"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* uncleanness \w of|strong="H5668"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* corrupted \w with|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* grievous corruption.

\w Would|strong="H3863"\w* God \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* hath \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* rather spoke \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*: \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1980"\w* drop \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* drunkenness: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* drop.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* thee, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7760"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w as|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fold|strong="H1223"\w*, \w as|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sheepcotes, \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* tumult \w by|strong="H3478"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* divide, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.
